body:
`libwebp` wouldn't install on macOS, so I converted it to `AutotoolsPackage`. The [Homebrew recipe](https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/blob/master/Formula/webp.rb) also uses Autotools.

Also added some variants to enable/disable libwebpmux support.

Successfully installs on macOS 10.15.2 with Clang 11.0.0 both with and without libwebpmux support enabled.
title: libwebp: CMakePackage -> AutotoolsPackage
